mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO rm_dorm_student_rel (pk_dorm_student_id, dorm_id, student_id, status, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id) VALUES
(#{item.pkDormStudentId}, #{item.dormId}, #{item.studentId}, #{item.status}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.createUserId}, #{item.lastModifyTime}, #{item.lastModifyUserId})
mapper.select: SELECT sr.pk_dorm_student_id AS pkDormStudentId, s.pk_student_id AS studentId, s.student_name AS studentName, s.student_num AS studentNum FROM rm_student s INNER JOIN rm_dorm_student_rel sr ON sr.student_id = s.pk_student_id WHERE r.`status` = 1 AND sr.dorm_id=#{dormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT '' AS pkDormStudentId, s.pk_student_id AS studentId, s.student_name AS studentName, s.student_num AS studentNum FROM rm_student s WHERE s.`status` = 1 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM rm_dorm_student_rel sr WHERE sr.student_id = s.pk_student_id AND sr.dorm_id=#{dormId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
